name: blueberry twist headband
notes:
the blueberry twist headband was one of the designs i created for stitch up chicago 2025! this simple crochet headband or ear warmer features front and back loop single crochet stitches for amazing texture that’s beginner-friendly. this pattern is available in sizes for both adults and children, making it a versatile option for all ages. the pattern includes written instructions, a video tutorial, and photo tutorials to guide you through the process.
  
**unique features-**
  
• includes video tutorial for visual learners
• available in sizes for adults and children - easy to customize for any size
• unisex design for versatile wear
• written pattern and photo tutorials for easy understanding
  
  
**materials needed-**
  
• hook: 8mm (us size 11.0)
• yarn: [**caron simply me**](https://shrsl.com/4vrrm) (bulky weight, 50 yards)
